content.raw:
At this point I think all the gazebo tests pass. I've been running them on 4 softlayer machines and on my desktop. The only problem I see is on the softlayer machines where the "check_*" tests for the GUI tests fail. I'm looking into this now.

I'm also switching over to run the drcsim tests, and resolving issues associated with those tests.
